required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multiple-dose Study of LY3031207 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Multiple-Dose, Dose-Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of LY3031207 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The purposes of this study are to look at safety, how well the study drug is tolerated, how much of the study drug gets into the blood stream, and how long it takes the body to get rid of it when given to healthy Japanese and non-Japanese participants as multiple doses. In addition, effects of 28-day oral dosing of LY3031207 on the amount of a cholesterol-lowering drug (simvastatin) that gets into the blood stream and how long the body takes to get rid of it will be determined. The effects of LY3031207 after single and 28-day dosing on blood pressure will also be studied. Information about any side effects that may occur will be collected.

clinical_study.why_stopped: Elevation of alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and aspartate aminotransferase (AST) in some participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With One or More Drug Related Adverse Events (AEs) or Any Serious AEs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to study completion (treatment completion and follow-up, up to 35 weeks)
primary_outcome.description: A treatment emergent adverse event (TEAE) is defined as an adverse event (AE) that occurs postdose or that is present predose and becomes more severe postdose. AEs presented are of all causalities and all severities. A summary of serious and other non-serious AEs regardless of causality is located in the Reported Adverse Events module.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post last dose at Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum concentration (Cmax) of LY3031207 post-repeated once daily doses at Day 28. Day 28 results were not calculated for participants who received 225 mg LY3031207 because the study was terminated prior to participants reaching 28 days of dosing for this treatment arm.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Concentration Curve (AUC) of LY3031207
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post last dose at Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration versus time curve in a dosing interval (AUC[0-tau]) of LY3031207 post-repeated once daily doses at Day 28. Day 28 results were not calculated for participants who received 225 mg LY3031207 because the study was terminated prior to participants reaching 28 days of dosing for this treatment arm.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Time of Maximum Concentration (Tmax) of LY3031207
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post last dose at Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum concentration (Tmax) of LY3031207 post-repeated once daily doses at Day 28. Day 28 results were not calculated for participants who received 225 mg LY3031207 because the study was terminated prior to participants reaching 28 days of dosing for this treatment arm.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post dose at Day -3 and Day 28

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Area Under the Concentration Curve (AUC) of Simvastatin
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post dose at Day -3 and Day 28
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration versus time curve over the range of all measureable concentrations (AUC[0-tlast]) of simvastatin.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Time of Maximum Concentration (Tmax) of Simvastatin
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post dose at Day -3 and Day 28

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Day 28 in Urinary Prostacyclin I (PGI) Metabolite Excretion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Predose up to 12 hours prior to last dose at Day 28

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Day 28 in Urinary Prostaglandin E (PGE) Metabolite Excretion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Predose up to time of last dose at Day 28

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline to Day 28 in Urinary Thromboxane A (TXA) Metabolite Excretion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, Predose up to 12 hours prior to last dose at Day 28

arm_group.description: Daily oral administration of placebo for 28 days. Dose will match corresponding LY3031207 dosage.
Daily oral administration of 25 milligrams (mg) LY3031207 up to 450 mg LY3031207 for 28 days.
Daily oral administration of 400 mg celecoxib for 28 days. Positive control for LY3031207.
Daily oral administration of 75 mg LY3031207 or 225 mg LY3031207 for 28 days. Single, oral 10 mg simvastatin open-label dose administered before and after 28-day dosing of LY3031207.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Overtly healthy individuals based on the history and physical examinations as determined by the investigator, including first generation Japanese
- Body mass index between 17.0 and 32.0 kilograms per square meter (kg/m^2), inclusive
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have known allergies to LY3031207 or any components of the formulation, simvastatin or related compounds (other 3-Hydroxy-3-Methyl-Glutaryl-CoA [HMG CoA] reductase inhibitors), celecoxib, or sulfonamides. Participants with known aspirin allergy or allergic reaction to nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) should also be excluded

overall_official.last_name: Call 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559) or 1-317-615-4559 Mon - Fri, 9 AM - 5 PM Eastern time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST)

facility.name: For additional information regarding investigative sites for this trial, contact 1-877-CTLILLY (1-877-285-4559, 1-317-615-4559) Mon - Fri from 9 AM to 5 PM Eastern Time (UTC/GMT - 5 hours, EST), or speak with your personal physician.

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: Study enrolled participants of both Japanese and non-Japanese decent. Participants were pooled regardless of ethnicity. Participants assigned to 75 milligrams (mg) LY3031207 and 225 mg LY3031207 underwent identical procedures as those assigned to 25 mg LY3031207 with the addition of 10 mg open-label simvastatin administration on Days -3 and 28.

group.title: 25 mg LY3031207
group.description: Daily oral administration of 25 milligrams (mg) LY3031207 for 28 days.

group.title: 75 mg LY3031207 and Simvastatin
group.description: Daily oral administration of 75 mg LY3031207 for up to 28 days. In addition, participants received oral administration of 10 mg open-label simvastatin on Days -3 and 28.

group.title: 225 mg LY3031207 and Simvastatin
group.description: Daily oral administration of 225 mg LY3031207 for up to 22 days. In addition, participants received oral administration of 10 mg open-label simvastatin on Day -3 only.

group.title: Placebo With or Without Simvastatin
group.description: Daily oral administration of placebo for up to 28 days with or without oral administration of 10 mg open-label simvastatin on Days -3 and 28.

group.title: 400 mg Celecoxib With or Without Simvastatin
group.description: Daily oral administration of 400 mg celecoxib for up to 28 days with or without oral administration of 10 mg open-label simvastatin on Days -3 and 28.

Received at Least One Dose Simvastatin

outcome.title: Number of Participants With One or More Drug Related Adverse Events (AEs) or Any Serious AEs
outcome.description: A treatment emergent adverse event (TEAE) is defined as an adverse event (AE) that occurs postdose or that is present predose and becomes more severe postdose. AEs presented are of all causalities and all severities. A summary of serious and other non-serious AEs regardless of causality is located in the Reported Adverse Events module.

outcome.population: Participants who received at least one dose of study drug.

group.title: 10 mg Simvastatin
group.description: Oral administration of 10 mg open-label simvastatin on Days -3 and 28 for participants randomized to 75 mg LY3031207, 225 mg LY3031207 (Day -3 only), placebo, or celecoxib. Adverse events occurring following simvastatin dosing on Day -3 but prior to study drug dosing on Day 1 were counted under simvastatin.

outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post last dose at Day 28
outcome.population: Participants who received at least one dose of LY3031207 with evaluable Cmax data at Day 28. Participants who had incomplete data due to early discontinuation were not analyzed.

outcome.time_frame: Predose up to 48 hours post dose at Day -3 and Day 28

Participants who had incomplete data due to early discontinuation were not analyzed.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is more than 60 days but less than or equal to 180 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: Lilly voluntarily discontinued dosing of LY3031207 for all participants in LBCB because of early discontinuation criteria being met. Data for some endpoints (including blood pressure and Japanese comparison) were incomplete for the planned analyses.
